subject: Public Speaking
title: Cicero: Latin Golden Age
description: One-minute skill: Cicero: Latin Golden Age.

hook.text: Cicero's speeches were so powerful his enemies had his tongue cut out.

buildup.text: He combined logic, emotion, and beautiful language masterfully.

discovery.text: His Catilinarian speeches remain the gold standard for rhetoric.

twist.text: Cicero showed that language itself is a weapon against power.

climax.text: Eloquence combined with substance changes history.

punchline.text: Speak with purpose and beauty. Start revolutions.
